wikitext.*:
[[File:Roger Verhulst 3 May 1966.jpg|thumb]]
On [[3 May]] [[1966]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Roger Verhulst'''.<ref>[http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/dmiller/CLP0125.htm Lot of correspondence between J.R.R. Tolkien and Roger Verhulst] at [[Tolkien Library]] (accessed 31 October 2010)</ref>

*'''Contents:''' This card is a brief thank you note to the Eerdmans Publishing Co. for sending a book about [[Charles Williams]] to Tolkien.
*'''Publication:''' None. A description of the letter has been provided in ''[[W.H. Auden: A Legacy]]'' and on the website [[Tolkien Library]]. A description of the letter has appeared in the catalogue ''Christie's Fine Printed Books and Manuscripts 28 November 2011'' (lot 258).
*'''Description:''' Embossed 76 Sandfield Road stationery card. Signed by J.R.R. Tolkien.
